Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won against Afghanistan by 6 wickets
Dhananjaya de Silva guided Sri Lanka to a comfortable win
Afghanistan will exit the tournament with this loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: This has been a comfortable win for Sri Lanka and they keep their chances of making it to the semi-finals alive with a 6-wicket win
Others: After this loss, Afghanistan will exit the tournament and will look to pick up a consolation win in their last fixture against Australia
